title: Khawvela mite | zawng zawng Pa
lyrics:
Khawvela mite | zawng zawng Pa,
Chi tinrengin an | fak a che;
Mi chhiar sen loh Nang - | mahah chuan,
Pum - | khat kan ni.

Pathian fapa, hma- | ngaihnain,
Chitin tan mihring- | ah i piang;
Nangmahah kan Pa- | thian zawmin,
Pum-| khat kan ni.

Nangmahah Pathian | fa kan ni,
Nang, khawvel Ima-| nuela
Nangmahah thianghlim | chhiar sen loh,
Pum-| khat turin.

Nang, Tuikhur hlu chu | i ni a,
I thisen hluin | min tleng a;
I van chawin min | chawm fo la,
Pum- | khat turin.

Aw Thlarau Thianghlim, | lo kal la,
Kan hrehawm zawng zawng | tirehin;
Rinna leh hmangaih | min pe la,
Pum-| khat turin.

Aw, mi pathum pum- | khatte chu,
Pathiana mi pa-| thumte chu;
Kan thinlungah lo | cheng ula,
Pum-| khat turin.

He khawvel hi a | ral hunin,
Lawm takin heng hi | kan sawi ang;
Chatuan ni tlan seng | lovah hian,
Pum-| khat kan ni.
